snippet: Revelations from Britain’s phone hacking scandal prompted renewed suspicions among some relatives of Sept. 11 victims that their phones had been hacked.
abstract: Revelations from Britain’s phone hacking scandal prompt renewed suspicions among some relatives of Sept 11 victims that their phones were hacked shortly after the attack; family members ask Atty Gen Eric H Holder to see whether Scotland Yard has record of their names or phone numbers from material seized in News of the World hacking investigation.
lead_paragraph: Revelations from Britain’s phone hacking scandal prompted renewed suspicions among some relatives of Sept. 11 victims that their phones had been hacked.

headline.seo: Relatives of 9/11 Victims, Suspecting Hacking, Await Answers
headline.main: 9/11 Relatives Who Suspect Hacking Await Answers
headline.print_headline: 9/11 Relatives Who Suspect Hacking Await Answers
